channel.title: WuXu's Library
channel.description: Get all the updates for WuXu's Library!

item.title: Odyssey Added!
item.description: The Odyssey jailbreak tool has been added to the source!

item.title: Taurine Added!
item.description: The Taurine jailbreak tool has been added to the source!

item.title: Unc0ver Added!
item.description: The unc0ver jailbreaking tool has been added to the source!

item.title: iTorrent Added!
item.description: iTorrent has been added to the library! A torrent client for iOS with Files app support.

item.title: Cowabunga Updated!
item.description: Cowabunga has been updated to the latest version - You can now remove the three app limit within the app! - click here for more info

item.title: ESign Updated!
item.description: ESign has been updated to the latest version!

item.title: AppDB Updated!
item.description: AppDB has been updated to the latest version!

item.title: Clash of Clans Added!
item.description: Clash of Clans on a modded server has been added to the source! Unlimited gems, elixir and gold!

item.title: Clash Royale Added!
item.description: Clash Royale on a modded private server has been added to the source! Unlimited gems, gold and resources etc.

item.title: Angry Birds Space Added!
item.description: Relive your childhood with the nostalgic, Angry Birds Space game!

item.title: Angry Birds Star Wars Added!
item.description: Relive your childhood with the nostalgic, Angry Birds Star Wars game!

item.title: Pokemon Go (w/ SpooferPro) Added!
item.description: Pokemon Go injected with SpooferPro has been added to the source!

item.title: WDBRemoveThreeAppLimit Removed!
item.description: This app has been removed, please use Cowabunga as they now offer this tweak
